text: @Mike_Pence ‘Sanctity of human life!’?!  Are you insane?! 142,080 dead from COVID-19 in 4 months and still no proper plan to contact trace, social distance, shaming mask-wearing instead of protecting citizens.  You and Trump don’t give a rat’s ass about human life! ☠️ @realDonaldTrump
